text: Warrhak is a Chaos Dwarf Overlord, a leader of Dawi Zharr slave hunting expeditions.
None but the highest and most powerful servants of Hashut can hope to master these hellish monsters.
None but the highest and most powerful servants of Hashut can hope to master these hellish monsters.
Woe and ruin is the industry of Warrhak and his legions, as the Southern Darklands will soon come to know.
It is politically unwise to stray too far, or for too long from Zharr-Naggrund, but there are still Chaos Dwarfs who flock to Warrhak's banner by way of necessity.
The former kin of Dawi Zharr call these lands home, and there is no love lost between the two peoples.
Send the hobgoblin scouts to chart these lands, and find the next target for Warrhak's legions.
This slave expedition has proceeded beyond Warrhak's expectations, and he senses an opportunity for great personal advancement.
Lay down tracks that will carry riches and slaves to the heart of the Dawi Zharr empire.
Make a bargain with the Daemonsmith of Zharr-Nagrund for the finest of their craft.
All the lords in Zharr-Nagrund will know of Warrhak and the great works that are being done for the glory of Zharr-Naggrund.
Secure these lands and dot them with towers and fortresses. Let it be known that these lands belong to the Dawi Zharr Empire now.
Attribute: Causes Frenzy when fighting against Dwarfs
Warrhak Skullcrusher has a chance to prove himself in these distant lands, or perish should he not be worthy.
Warrhak Skullcrusher is a cruel Chaos Dwarf Overlord, in command of a slave gathering expedition into the Southern Badlands.
Always best to err on the side of caution when it comes to bullets, bolts and arrows.
Double experience gain for units when fighting against Dwarfs
Warrhak's blunderbuss has limited ammunition but can bring ruin on packed enemy formations.
Mastercrafted Bandolier fitted for ammunition Warrhak uses for his Blunderbuss.
Mastercrafted Bandolier fitted for ammunition Warrhak uses for his Blunderbuss.
Gromril armour inlaid with powerful runes, and worked on by the masters of the Daemoncraft art.

An Iron Daemon is a monstrous, smoke-belching war machine.
